function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conducting exploratory interviews with construction experts without proper protective measures may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Risk of exposing construction experts to contagious diseases, potentially leading to illness or transmission to others.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, social distancing, and personal protective equipment for both interviewer and interviewees.","Technologies":"Use of virtual interviews or video conferencing to minimize physical contact.","People":"Construction experts, researchers conducting interviews, support staff assisting with interviews.","Owner":"Researchers conducting the interviews, construction industry stakeholders."},{"Description":"Using questionnaire surveys without proper safeguards can result in the transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases among construction practitioners participating in the survey.","Mitigation":"Offer online survey options, implement strict hygiene protocols for paper-based surveys, and ensure proper sanitation of survey materials.","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, digital survey tools, touchless survey response methods.","People":"Construction practitioners participating in the survey, researchers administering the survey, support staff involved in survey distribution.","Owner":"Researchers administering the survey, organizations conducting the survey."},{"Description":"Data analysis involving physical interaction and close collaboration may pose a risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Risk of exposure to contagious diseases during data analysis sessions, leading to illness or transmission.","Mitigation":"Utilize virtual data analysis tools, maintain social distancing during in-person sessions, and ensure proper ventilation in workspaces.","Technologies":"Virtual collaboration platforms, remote data analysis tools, video conferencing for virtual meetings.","People":"Researchers involved in data analysis, support staff in data analysis process.","Owner":"Researchers conducting data analysis, organizations overseeing the research project."}]}
